HomePage.title: Gerimli Hereket
HomePage.heroTitle: Your reliable partner in logistics and transportation
HomePage.heroDescription: Welcome to Gadamly Inžener Logistics and Transportation Company, your comprehensive destination in Central Asia for seamless freight forwarding services.
HomePage.logisticsSolutionDescription: Ready to streamline your logistics with Gerimli Hereket?

AboutPage.aboutDescription: We value our reputation and value your time. Our company can create solutions that meet the needs of your business
AboutPage.aboutContentTitle: Your reliable partner in logistics and transportation
AboutPage.aboutContentDescription: As a proud member of the Turkmen Logistics Association (TLA) and the International Federation of Freight Forwarders Associations FIATA, Gadamly Inžener expands its global network, fostering collaboration with reputable international freight forwarders. We are committed to building strong partnerships that enhance our capabilities and serve you better
